summary: This is an email chain from December 30, 2020, forwarding a Mutual Legal Assistance Treaty (MLAT) request from French authorities regarding their investigation of an individual recently arrested in Paris. The email mentions coordination with individuals involved in the Maxwell bail proceedings.

persons.name: Ghislaine Maxwell
persons.context: Mentioned as the subject of ongoing bail proceedings that the email sender has been in touch about with other individuals.

events.title: French MLAT Request Referral
events.description: A Mutual Legal Assistance Treaty request from French authorities is referred to U.S. contacts. The request relates to a French investigation of an individual recently arrested and placed under examination in Paris.

events.title: Maxwell Bail Proceedings
events.description: Ongoing legal proceedings regarding Ghislaine Maxwell's bail are mentioned as a topic of prior communication between the email sender and other individuals.

keyFacts: French authorities issued an MLAT request to the U.S. in December 2020 related to an investigation of an individual recently arrested in Paris.
The email sender, a DOJ Attach√©/Magistrat de liaison at the U.S. Embassy in Paris, coordinated the referral of the French MLAT request.
The communication mentions prior contact with individuals regarding the bail proceedings of Ghislaine Maxwell.
The document indicates international cooperation between French and U.S. authorities in late 2020 regarding an investigation connected to the Epstein/Maxwell case.
